## Project Overview
Neko233 Hardware Viewer is a Cyberpunk-themed hardware diagnostic tool built with Tauri (Rust) and Vue 3.
It provides detailed hardware specifications, real-time monitoring, and performance scoring.

## Key Components
- **Backend**: `src-tauri/src/main.rs` (Commands), `src-tauri/src/hardware/` (WMI Logic)
- **Frontend**: `src/components/HardwareView.vue` (Main UI), `src/locales/` (Translations)
- **Config**: `src/config/drivers.ts` (Driver Links)
